message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this great product to you today. I think it would be perfect for you! I'm asking for $200 to start. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but $200 is a bit too high for my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $120.
I understand your budget concerns, Bob, but $120 is quite a bit lower than I'm willing to go. How about we meet in the middle at $170?
I appreciate your flexibility, but $170 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so how about $140?
